concept.title: caching behavior
concept.shortdesc: caches user information and credentials in a security cache and the login module will not be invoked while a user entry is valid in this cache.

conbody.p: The default invalidation time for this security cache is ten minutes, where the user has been inactive for ten minutes. The WebSphere Caching Behavior section in the CÃºram Security Handbook should be consulted for further details on this.
